document.full_text: tsunamis triggered by japan's devastating earthquake that prompted evacuations on the pacific coast of north and south america caused flooding as far away as chile saturday, but damage was limited.
document.title: japan tsunami grazes americas but impact light
lines_and_colors: tsunamis triggered by japan's devastating earthquake that prompted evacuations on the pacific coast of north and south america caused flooding as far away as chile saturday, but damage was limited.
